name: A light that never goes out
name_original: A light that never goes out
description:
A light that never goes out, is a game made in 48 hours for GMTK 2019 game jam! The game is a top-down, where you need to shoot enemies and solve mazes (actually one maze, due to time limitation) in order to win! The thing is, you can only see to your right and left, or your up and down. Only one...Direction!

Assets Used:

 Piskel/Unity
https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack
https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
https://opengameart.org/content/night
http://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/?id=238
mazegenerator.com
